verses.roman:
caturthe-mādhava purīra caritra-āsvādana
gopāla sthāpana, kṣīra-curira varṇana

synonyms: caturthe—in the Fourth Chapter; mādhava purīra—of Mādhavendra Purī; caritra-āsvādana—relishing the characteristics; gopāla sthāpana—the installation of Gopāla; kṣīra-curira varṇana—a description of Gopīnātha's stealing condensed milk at Remuṇā.
translation: In the Fourth Chapter I have described Mādhavendra Purī's installation of the Gopāla Deity as well as Gopīnātha's stealing a pot of condensed milk at Remuṇā.
